items.sentence: Tom and Mary were talking about their plans.
I don\'t want to go and Tom doesn\'t either.
I thought you were going to be gone all day.
I was surprised when I saw Tom kissing Mary.
I\'m here because Tom ordered me to be here.
I\'m just not sure exactly what it might be.
Tom and Mary are likely to get married soon.
Tom and Mary are not talking to one another.
Tom and Mary are now discussing the problem.
Tom doesn\'t want to live like this anymore.
Tom doesn\'t want to take that kind of risk.
Tom doesn\'t want you to get angry with him.
Tom died when his truck crashed into a tree.
Tom disappeared into one of the other rooms.
Tom is one of the best poker players I know.
Tom is rich enough to buy anything he wants.
Tom is still not very good at French, is he?
Respect yourselves and you\'ll be respected.
Who would\'ve thought that Tom would change?
I should\'ve known you couldn\'t be trusted.
The police officers aimed their guns at Tom.
I didn\'t know what I\'d done wasn\'t legal.
This is a really beautiful place, isn\'t it?
It\'s almost too good to be true, isn\'t it?
You shouldn\'t have talked to Tom like that.
Tom thought he had a chance to win the race.
What\'s your favorite kind of fish to catch?
What\'s your favorite non-electrical gadget?
I stole some food because I was very hungry.
I\'m the one who gave Tom your phone number.
I\'m the only one here who really knows Tom.
Tom wasn\'t able to do what he needed to do.
Tom wasn\'t really paying attention to Mary.
My grandfather can\'t walk without his cane.
I want to know exactly what you said to Tom.
I want to know if you have any time to help.
Tom gave Mary more credit than she deserved.
I\'m not pleased with how things turned out.
I\'m supposed to speak French in the office.
Tom pretended to be an undercover policeman.
I\'ve got something interesting to show you.
I\'ve got to get back to the office by 2:30.
I\'ve had it with you and your stupid ideas.
Let\'s not tell anybody that we\'re married.
Tom didn\'t invite me to his birthday party.
Tom didn\'t know Mary had agreed to do that.
Tom didn\'t realize how late it was getting.
I\'m the only one with a key to this locker.
Tom is the most handsome man I\'ve ever met.
I wish Tom had done what we asked him to do.
